content.raw:
I have picked up the following items with this branch:

3 blocks (all except 10 cm block)
Cricket ball
Stone

The 10cm block might be too big for this size hand to pick up, and the marble is hard to pick up because the middle finger doesn't quite reach.

When I tested this with mocap, jamming the fingers into the box was mostly stable. I saw the fingers fly apart once in a while, but the arm fly around everywhere like it did in default. I think this is vast improvement on the prior behavior.
content.html:
I have picked up the following items with this branch:

3 blocks (all except 10 cm block) Cricket ball Stone

The 10cm block might be too big for this size hand to pick up, and the marble is hard to pick up because the middle finger doesn't quite reach.

When I tested this with mocap, jamming the fingers into the box was mostly stable. I saw the fingers fly apart once in a while, but the arm fly around everywhere like it did in default. I think this is vast improvement on the prior behavior.
